resources.string: The app for this icon isn\'t installed. You can remove it, or search for the app and install it manually.

No more room in the Favorites tray
A Favorites icon will be created on the home screen. You can touch the icon to view all your favorite notifications.
A maximum of 1000 favorite notifications can be saved. Delete some notifications before you can add new ones. Go to your favorite notifications list?
Double-tap & hold to pick up a widget or use custom actions.
Touch & hold to pick up a widget.

Allows an app to add shortcuts without user intervention.
Allows the app to read the settings and shortcuts in Home.
Allows the app to change the settings and shortcuts in Home.
